resources.string: "Some locations couldn\'t be identified due to network problems."
"Couldn\'t download the photos in this album. Retry later."
"This item is stored locally and available offline."
"Can\'t trim: target video is too short"
"There is no content available for importing on this device."
"Camera has been disabled because of security policies."
"Set your device down.\nStep out of view for a moment."
"Video snapshot is disabled when special effects are on."
"Time-lapse feature is off. Turn it on to set time interval."
"Countdown timer is off. Turn it on to count down before taking a picture."
"Tag your photos and videos with the locations where they are taken.\n\nOther apps can access this information along with your saved images."
"This video isn\'t valid for streaming to this device."
"Drag the file to the yellow rectangle to share your screen."
"All copy-protected files are hidden due to Wi-Fi Display connection."
"Double touch and slide to zoom in/out in Camera"
"Double tap and slide to zoom in/out in Gallery"
"To play it on your TV, shake your phone on the video page."
"To play it on your TV, shake your phone on the picture page."
"To stop playing on TV, select a local player."
"File %s" isn\'t allowed to be cropped because the file is DRM protected."
"File %s" isn\'t allowed to be set as a contact icon because it is DRM protected."
"Drag the file to the yellow area"
"When the area is filled in yellow, sharing succeeds."
"DRM file shouldn\'t display through Wi-Fi Display."
"Save as a copy or overwrite the original image?"
"This burst sequence contains %s photos. Delete all of them?"
"Overwrite burst shots or save as individual images?"
"A real marvel awaits when you reach up to a certain amount of selfies. Start your journey now!"
"You need more selfies to create your own face show."
"This may take a few seconds, wait a moment..."
"Sort photos and videos by location in Moments"
"To sort photos and videos by location, allow Gallery permission to access Location."
"Present photos in different and incredible collages"
"Loading data, please wait for a moment!"
"SlowmoEdit isn\'t installed, and this function can\'t be used!"
"Select items and copy or move them here"
